summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许指定可插入到由公共字段或公共读/写属性返回的数组中的派生类型。The class allows you to specify the derived types that can be inserted into an array returned by a public field or public read/write property. 此类的实例由类的属性返回 。An instance of this class is returned by the property of the class. 当重写 可插入到已应用的数组的对象集时，将使用类 。The class is used when overriding the set of objects that can be inserted into an array to which the has been applied. 对于希望字段或属性接受的每个新类型，创建一个 并使用将 对象添加到 属性返回的集合中 。For each new type you want the field or property to accept, create an and use the to add the object to the collection returned by the property. 一个 ，它指定包含字段或属性的对象的类型以及字段或属性的名称。 the to an , that specifies the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. 在调用或方法之前，使用 构造 。Construct an with the before calling the or method.
